product_description: MyChai Chai Tea Concentrate Super. Product is packaged in the same square 0.5 gallon HDPE plastic bottles and have volumes of 68 fl oz.  Ingredients: Water, Sugar, Organic Black Tea, Organic Spices, Molasses, Vanilla Extract, Citric Acid, Natural Flavors.  Made by: MyChai, Inc. 1110 SE Centennial St. Suite 6, Bend, OR 97702.  USAGE: Use 1:5 ratio with milk or soy.  Up until fall of 2023, expiration dates were 2 years from the date of production.  In the fall of 2023 expiration dates were extended an additional year to 3 years from the production date.
reason_for_recall: Acidified Chai Tea product is recalled due to lack production record.
